label: HubspotEventsApi
description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Events API

tools.name: DeleteCustomEventDefinition
tools.description:
Delete a custom event definition by name.

Use this tool to delete a specified custom event definition in HubSpot by providing the event name. It is useful for managing and organizing event definitions that are no longer needed.

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The name of the custom event definition to delete.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: DeleteCustomEventProperty
tools.description:
Delete a property from a custom event definition.

Use this tool to remove an existing property from a specific custom event definition in Hubspot.

parameters.name: custom_event_internal_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event from which the property will be deleted.

parameters.name: property_internal_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the property to delete from the custom event.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: FetchEventDefinitionByName
tools.description:
Fetch details of a custom event definition by name.

Use this tool to retrieve the definition and details of a specific custom event by providing its name.

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event to fetch its definition.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: ListEventTypes
tools.description:
Retrieve a list of visible event type names.

This tool retrieves a list of event type names that are visible to the user, which can be used to query specific event instances.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: RetrieveCustomEventDefinitions
tools.description:
Retrieve existing custom event definitions from Hubspot.

Use this tool to obtain the current list of custom event definitions stored in Hubspot. It helps in understanding or displaying existing events configured within your system.

parameters.name: event_name_search_string
parameters.description: String of characters to search for in event names. This is a simple 'contains' search without fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: include_event_properties
parameters.description: Include event properties in the response. Set to true to include all properties.

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: The token indicating the position after the last successfully read resource for continued paged results.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of event definitions to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify the order to sort results. Use 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: UpdateCustomEventDefinition
tools.description:
Update a specific custom event definition by name.

Use this tool to update the definition of a specific custom event in Hubspot by specifying the event name.

parameters.name: internal_event_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event to be updated in Hubspot.

parameters.name: event_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the custom event to be displayed as help text in HubSpot.

parameters.name: event_label
parameters.description: The human-readable label for the event, used in the HubSpot UI.

event_description.value: Event triggered when a user signs up for an account.

documentationChunks.content:
## Auth

<Callout type="info">
The HubspotEventsApi MCP Server uses the Auth Provider with id `arcade-hubspot` to connect to users' HubspotEventsApi accounts. In order to use the MCP Server, you must configure the `arcade-hubspot` auth provider.
</Callout>

summary:
Arcade's HubspotEventsApi toolkit enables LLMs to interact seamlessly with the Hubspot Events API, streamlining event management for developers. It provides the necessary tools for creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting custom event definitions.

### Capabilities
- Manage custom event definitions in Hubspot efficiently.
- Access and update event properties with ease.
- Retrieve information on existing events and their types.
- Facilitate the cleanup of unnecessary event definitions.

### OAuth
- **Provider:** Unknown
- **Scopes:** behavioral_events.event_definitions.read_write, oauth

### Secrets
- No secrets are required for authentication.
